answers.author: Pam Broviak
answers.text:
Luc
I realize this response is much later than when you first asked, but thought I'd still share this suggestion. The APWA has established an accreditation program for public works departments. They have set up a method of self-assessment and then a review process that can be requested by the agency. They also offer a seminar about the program to help agencies move through the entire process more efficiently and with more success. 
Even if you are not planning on gaining accreditation, the assessment process is still helpful just for reviewing and establishing policy and processes.
Here is the link to information about the program: http://apwa.net/credentialing/accreditation
